articles.author: Ben Parsons
articles.title: Justin Rose explains decision to snub bumper LIV offer in return to Ryder Cup contention - The Mirror
articles.description: Former world no.1 Justin Rose ended a four-year wait for a victory at the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am on Monday to stake his claim for a place on the European Ryder Cup team
articles.content:
Justin Rose turned down the LIV Golf millions taken by his European Ryder Cup teammates and now feels vindicated after winning for the first time in four years.

articles.author: CGTN,China Global Television Network
articles.title: Small unknown asteroid accidentally detected by Webb telescope - CGTN
articles.description: European astronomers using the James Webb Space Telescope have detected a previously unknown asteroid about the size of Rome's Colosseum in the main asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter.
articles.content:
European astronomers using the James Webb Space Telescope have detected a previously unknown asteroid about the size of Rome's Colosseum in the main asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter.

articles.title: Webb detects extremely small main-belt asteroid - European Space Agency
